txt.en: Cána is worried that the Trév Duvárdain and their Angmarim masters are getting fat off the land that is rightfully that of the Trév Gállorg.

'The herbal poultice will help with our defence, [placeholder]; now we must see to the attack, and I know upon what to focus our efforts: peas!

'The farms north-east of here have been taken from my people and put to the use of the Trév Duvárdain. Now that we have retaken Fail-á-Khro, we can do something about it.

'Travel north-east to the farmland outside the city of Donnvail and harvest the pea-plants you find there. We may not have the numbers to take the farms, but we can at least take their peas!'
Pea-plants can be found in the farmland outside the city of Donnvail, north-east of Fail-á-Khro.\n\nCána has tasked you with recovering the pea-plants from the farms outside Donnvail.
'Thank you for these pea-plants, [placeholder]. Our enemies will go hungry tonight and know that we are serious about taking what is ours!'
Cána is at Fail-á-Khro, on the road north of Aughaire.\n\nYou have harvested pea-plants from the farms near Donnvail to keep them from the enemies of the Trév Gállorg.
'Harvest pea-plants from the farms outside the city of Donnvail, to the north-east. Bring them to me, and we will keep them from feeding our enemies!'
'The pea-plants belong to us, and you should recover them from the farms outside Donnvail, to the north-east!'
'You have performed many great deeds, [placeholder]. I thank you for the pea-plants.'
'Peas can be used in several delicacies of the Trév Gállorg.'
